DOC.brief_summary: This study will examine changes in various gut-derived hormones in obese type 2 diabetic patients before and after elective bariatric surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Gut Hormone Profiling in Obese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes (MK-0000-134)
